00001 /* bpred-yags.cpp: YAGS (Yet Another Global Scheme) Predictor [Eden and Mudge, MICRO 1998] */
00002 /*
00003  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT
00004  */
00005 
00006 #include <math.h>
00007 #define COMPONENT_NAME "yags"
00008 
00009 #ifdef BPRED_PARSE_ARGS
00010 if(!strcasecmp(COMPONENT_NAME,type))
00011 {
00012   int l1_size;
00013   int l2_size;
00014   int his_width;
00015   int Xor;
00016   int cache_size;
00017   int tag_width;
00018 
00019   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%[^:]:%d:%d:%d:%d:%d:%d",name,&l1_size,&l2_size,&his_width,&Xor,&cache_size,&tag_width) != 7)
00020     fatal("bad bpred options string %s (should be \"yags:name:l1_size:l2_size:his_width:xor:cache_size:tag_width\")",opt_string);
00021   return new bpred_yags_t(name,l1_size,l2_size,his_width,Xor,cache_size,tag_width);
00022 }
00023 #else

00025 class bpred_yags_t:public bpred_dir_t
00026 {
00027   struct yags_cache_t{
00028     unsigned char tag;
00029     my2bc_t ctr;
00030   };
00031 
00032   class bpred_yags_sc_t:public bpred_sc_t
00033   {
00034     public:
00035     my2bc_t * pht_ctr;
00036     struct yags_cache_t * cache_entry;
00037     int * bhr;
00038     char tag_match;
00039     bool pred;
00040     bool choice;
00041     int lookup_bhr;
00042   };
00043 
00044   protected:
00045 
00046   int bht_size;
00047   int bht_mask;
00048   int * bht;
00049   int pht_size;
00050   int pht_mask;
00051   int tag_width;
00052   int tag_mask;
00053   int cache_size;
00054   int cache_mask;
00055   my2bc_t * pht;
00056   struct yags_cache_t * T_cache;
00057   struct yags_cache_t * NT_cache;
00058 
00059   int history_length;
00060   int history_mask;
00061   int Xor;
00062   int xorshift;

00066   /* CREATE */
00067   bpred_yags_t(char * const arg_name,
00068                const int arg_bht_size,
00069                const int arg_pht_size,
00070                const int arg_history_length,
00071                const int arg_Xor,
00072                const int arg_cache_size,
00073                const int arg_tag_width
00074               )
00075   {
00076     init();
00077 
00078     /* verify arguments are valid */
00079     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_bht_size);
00080     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_pht_size);
00081     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_cache_size);
00082     CHECK_NNEG(arg_history_length);
00083     CHECK_BOOL(arg_Xor);
00084 
00085     name = strdup(arg_name);
00086     if(!name)
00087       fatal("couldn't malloc yags name (strdup)");
00088     type = strdup(COMPONENT_NAME);
00089     if(!type)
00090       fatal("couldn't malloc yags type (strdup)");
00091 
00092     bht_size = arg_bht_size;
00093     bht_mask = arg_bht_size-1;
00094     pht_size = arg_pht_size;
00095     pht_mask = arg_pht_size-1;
00096     tag_width = arg_tag_width;
00097     tag_mask = (1<<arg_tag_width)-1;
00098     cache_size = arg_cache_size;
00099     cache_mask = arg_cache_size-1;
00100     history_length = arg_history_length;
00101     history_mask = (1<<arg_history_length)-1;
00102     Xor = arg_Xor;
00103     if(arg_Xor)
00104     {
00105       xorshift = log_base2(arg_cache_size)-arg_history_length;
00106       if(xorshift < 0)
00107         xorshift = 0;
00108     }
00109 
00110     bht = (int*) calloc(bht_size,sizeof(int));
00111     if(!bht)
00112       fatal("couldn't malloc yags BHT");
00113     pht = (my2bc_t*) calloc(pht_size,sizeof(my2bc_t));
00114     if(!pht)
00115       fatal("couldn't malloc yags PHT");
00116     for(int i=0;i<pht_size;i++)
00117       pht[i] = (i&1)?MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN:MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00118     T_cache = (struct yags_cache_t*) calloc(cache_size,sizeof(struct yags_cache_t));
00119     NT_cache = (struct yags_cache_t*) calloc(cache_size,sizeof(struct yags_cache_t));
00120     if(!T_cache || !NT_cache)
00121       fatal("couldn't malloc yags cache");
00122     for(int i=0;i<cache_size;i++)
00123     {
00124       T_cache[i].ctr = MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN;
00125       NT_cache[i].ctr = MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00126     }
00127 
00128     bits =  bht_size*history_length + pht_size*2
00129            + (tag_width+2)*cache_size * 2;
00130   }
00131 
00132   /* DESTROY */
00133   ~bpred_yags_t()
00134   {
00135     free(T_cache); T_cache = NULL;
00136     free(NT_cache); NT_cache = NULL;
00137     free(pht); pht = NULL;
00138     free(bht); bht = NULL;
00139   }
00140 
00141   /* LOOKUP */
00142   BPRED_LOOKUP_HEADER
00143   {
00144     class bpred_yags_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_yags_sc_t*) scvp;
00145     int l1index = PC&bht_mask;
00146     int l2index;
00147     bool pred;
00148 
00149     sc->bhr = &bht[l1index];
00150 
00151     /* "choice PHT" */
00152     sc->pht_ctr = &pht[PC&pht_mask];
00153     pred = MY2BC_DIR(*sc->pht_ctr);
00154     sc->choice = pred;
00155 
00156     if(Xor)
00157       l2index = PC^(*sc->bhr<<xorshift);
00158     else
00159       l2index = (PC<<history_length)|*sc->bhr;
00160     l2index &= cache_mask;
00161 
00162     sc->cache_entry = (pred)
00163                      ? (&NT_cache[l2index])
00164                      : (&T_cache[l2index]);
00165     sc->tag_match = sc->cache_entry->tag == (PC & tag_mask);
00166 
00167     if(sc->tag_match)
00168       pred = MY2BC_DIR(sc->cache_entry->ctr);
00169 
00170     BPRED_STAT(lookups++;)
00171 
00172     sc->pred = pred;
00173     sc->updated = false;
00174     sc->lookup_bhr = *sc->bhr;
00175 
00176     return pred;
00177   }
00178 
00179   /* UPDATE */
00180   BPRED_UPDATE_HEADER
00181   {
00182     class bpred_yags_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_yags_sc_t*) scvp;
00183     bool pred = sc->pred;
00184     bool choice = sc->choice;
00185 
00186     /*
00187     choice = MY2BC_DIR(*sc->pht_ctr);
00188     pred = (sc->tag_match)
00189          ? MY2BC_DIR(sc->cache_entry->ctr)
00190          : MY2BC_DIR(*sc->pht_ctr);
00191      */
00192 
00193     if(sc->tag_match)
00194     {
00195       MY2BC_UPDATE(sc->cache_entry->ctr,outcome);
00196     }
00197     else if(choice ^ outcome)
00198     {
00199       MY2BC_UPDATE(sc->cache_entry->ctr,outcome);
00200       sc->cache_entry->tag = PC & tag_mask;
00201     }
00202     if(!(pred == outcome && choice != outcome))
00203       MY2BC_UPDATE(*sc->pht_ctr,outcome);
00204 
00205     if(!sc->updated)
00206     {
00207         BPRED_STAT(updates++;)
00208         BPRED_STAT(num_hits += our_pred == outcome;)
00209         sc->updated = true;
00210     }
00211   }
00212 
00213   /* SPEC_UPDATE */
00214   BPRED_SPEC_UPDATE_HEADER
00215   {
00216     class bpred_yags_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_yags_sc_t*) scvp;
00217     BPRED_STAT(spec_updates++;)
00218 
00219     *sc->bhr = ((*sc->bhr<<1)|our_pred)&history_mask;
00220   }
00221 
00222   /* RECOVER */
00223   BPRED_RECOVER_HEADER
00224   {
00225     class bpred_yags_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_yags_sc_t*) scvp;
00226     if(bht_size == 1)
00227         bht[0] = (sc->lookup_bhr<<1)|outcome;
00228   }
00229 
00230   /* FLUSH */
00231   BPRED_FLUSH_HEADER
00232   {
00233     class bpred_yags_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_yags_sc_t*) scvp;
00234     if(bht_size == 1)
00235       bht[0] = sc->lookup_bhr;
00236   }
00237 
00238   /* GET_CACHE */
00239   BPRED_GET_CACHE_HEADER
00240   {
00241     class bpred_yags_sc_t * sc = new bpred_yags_sc_t();
00242     if(!sc)
00243       fatal("couldn't malloc yags State Cache");
00244     return sc;
00245   }
00246 
00247 };
00248 
00249 #endif /* BPRED_PARSE_ARGS */
